page.title: 10FASHIONS
page.content: {Underwear GIRLS: The bra is worn over the breasts. Knickers are worn on the lower part of the body. A petticoat is worn from the waist to the knees. Socks, stockings or tights are worn on the feet and legs. BOYS: Pants are worn on the lower part of the body. Vests are worn on the upper part of the body. Socks are worn on the feet. {Swimwear GIRLS: An all-in-one swimsuit can be worn on the upper and lower part of the body. A bikini is worn on the upper part of the body and the lower part but it is in two pieces. BOYS: Boys wear swimming trunks which are worn on the lower part of the body.
